DOC.brief_summary: This study will asses the long term safety and efficacy of oral bosentan to patients suffering from Interstitial Lung Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Study With Bosentan in Interstitial Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: To have completed the 12month treatment period of the AC052330/BUILD 2. Women should not be pregnant Women of childbearing potential must have a negative pretreatment pregnancy test and use a reliable method of contraception Signed informed consent prior to initiation of any studymandated procedure Any major violation of the protocol AC052330.
